backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping each AuraFlora UI feature (hero, about, services, gallery, contact) to their implementing source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary providing one-sentence descriptions of each frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the project's component structure.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based design token CSS variables for light and dark themes, including colors, radius, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the AuraFlora React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that assembles the full single-page AuraFlora layout by composing Navbar, HeroSection, AboutSection, ServicesSection, GallerySection, ContactSection, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Asymmetric 12-column grid About section featuring a decorative blob image, large display heading, brand story paragraphs, and three animated stat counters.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section with brand copy, studio details, and a controlled form (name, email, message) that shows a loading state and success confirmation on submission.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Dark-themed footer with the AuraFlora logo, smooth-scroll navigation links, social icon buttons (Instagram, Facebook, Pinterest), contact info, and a copyright bar.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Renders a masonry-style image gallery section with four botanical images in a responsive CSS grid, including hover effects and a decorative blob background element.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with a background image, decorative blurred blobs, headline text, two CTA buttons with smooth-scroll behavior, and an animated scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Fixed navigation bar with scroll-aware styling, smooth-scroll anchor links, a desktop nav with hover underline effects, and a collapsible mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Reusable card component displaying a service with an icon, title, description, decorative background blob, index number, and a hover-animated 'Discover' arrow.
Renders a two-column grid of four ServiceCard components (bespoke arrangements, perfumery, gifting, event curation) with a section header and gradient background.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, identity persistence, and exposing status flags to consumers.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining the AuraFlora pastel design system using OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes, Tailwind base/components/utilities layers, and custom component styles for navbar, contact inputs, and font utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication wrapping the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with AuraFlora brand colors (OKLCH-based), custom fonts (Cormorant Garamond, Jost), border radii, box shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing the AuraFlora website's architecture, existing features, required images, and build metadata at schema version 1.0.0 / project state version 3.
